name: skopos
description:
Welcome to the world of skopos!

You play as Skopos, an ambitious loner, who tries to pursue their dream of finding great treasure. Will they find it? Residents and the Goddesses of their world will teach Skopos about the important things in life that keep the world together.

This game was made within the last six months by me, a 20 year old game designer and developer trainee from Germany. Credits to WeLoveIndies for most sfx sounds in the game. Since I am still in training and eager to improve, your feedback is highly appreciated.

Thank you for playing.
